TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CloseStatusCode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Contains the values of the status codes for the WebSocket connection closure.

remarks.para: The CloseStatusCode enumeration contains the values of the status codes for the WebSocket connection closure defined in RFC 6455 for the WebSocket protocol.

"Reserved value" must not be set as a status code in a close control frame by an endpoint. It is designated for use in applications expecting a status code to indicate that connection was closed due to a system grounds.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode ABNORMAL = unsigned int16(1006)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to close status 1006. Indicates that the connection was closed abnormally. Reserved value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode AWAY = unsigned int16(1001)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to close status 1001. Indicates that an endpoint is "going away".

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode IGNORE_EXTENSION = unsigned int16(1010)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to close status 1010. Indicates that an endpoint (client) is terminating the connection because it has expected the server to negotiate one or more extension, but the server didn't return them in the response message of the WebSocket handshake.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode INCONSISTENT_DATA = unsigned int16(1007)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to close status 1007. Indicates that an endpoint is terminating the connection because it has received data within a message that was not consistent with the type of the message.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode INCORRECT_DATA = unsigned int16(1003)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to close status 1003. Indicates that an endpoint is terminating the connection because it has received a type of data it cannot accept.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode NO_STATUS_CODE = unsigned int16(1005)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to close status 1005. Indicates that no status code was actually present. Reserved value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode NORMAL = unsigned int16(1000)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to close status 1000. Indicates a normal closure.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode POLICY_VIOLATION = unsigned int16(1008)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to close status 1008. Indicates that an endpoint is terminating the connection because it has received a message that violates its policy.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode PROTOCOL_ERROR = unsigned int16(1002)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to close status 1002. Indicates that an endpoint is terminating the connection due to a protocol error.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode SERVER_ERROR = unsigned int16(1011)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to close status 1011. Indicates that a server is terminating the connection because it encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode TLS_HANDSHAKE_FAILURE = unsigned int16(1015)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to close status 1015. Indicates that the connection was closed due to a failure to perform a TLS handshake. Reserved value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode TOO_BIG = unsigned int16(1009)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to close status 1009. Indicates that an endpoint is terminating the connection because it has received a message that is too big for it to process.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode UNDEFINED = unsigned int16(1004)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to close status 1004. Still undefined. Reserved value.
